attributes.action: Sack Home Secretary Jacqui Smith for abuse of the expenses system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In claiming that her sister's house is her primary residence Jacqui Smith is abusing the MPs expenses system for her own benefit. She is not fit to be an MP let-alone a Minister.  We seek her immediate removal as Home Secretary - and ask her to resign as an MP.
